about_the_game:
Just out of the university campus, he encountered obstacles in his career. Fortunately, he was taken in by beautiful senior student Xu Jingwen and started working in Haishe Apartment.
Huang Di, who was unhappy with his life, began to give up on himself. He died unexpectedly after an all-night game. When he was dying, he met an immortal who descended from heaven. The immortal promised Huang Di that he would give him another chance to live as long as he lived a good life and fell in love seriously.
Huang Di and Daxian made a contract and woke up again. Huang Di must follow the agreement to win the sincerity of a girl within thirty days, so that he can truly come back to life.

After being reborn, Huang Di is full of luck and encounters eight girls with different personalities and backgrounds.
In the process of getting acquainted with different girls, Huang Di learned the secrets behind different girls.
Huangji and the girls help each other and understand each other, exchanging sincerity for true love, leading to the final outcome.

The player's choice is not only related to the emotional ending of Huangdi and his beloved girl, but also determines the fate of Huangdi itself whether it can be resurrected.

Product features
Diverse story experience:
More than 100 story branches and rich endings: The game provides players with rich story branches, diverse endings, and many hidden story lines and Easter eggs. Combined with the achievement system, the game encourages players to explore deeply and repeat the experience to find all possible story directions. In this game, players are encouraged to make choices based on their own intuition and emotions, and experience a diverse and rich gaming life.

Live performance, immersive experience:
Real interpretation, endless excitement: The game uses real-life interpretation and real-life shooting, providing players with an immersive experience. By exploring the highlights and behind-the-scenes stories in the game, players can gain an in-depth understanding of the character's inner world and increase their emotional connection with the character. At the same time, through the perspective of female characters, the game uniquely delivers unique emotional communication skills.

Innovative gameplay, strategy discovery:
Depth of gameplay beyond choice: The highlight of this game is not only the variety of choices, but also the player's ability to discover key plot clues through interaction with the environment. This design makes the gameplay of the game more rich and strategic. Every seemingly inconspicuous action may change the direction of the story, providing unlimited possibilities and the fun of exploration.

Diverse character charm:
Female characters with distinctive personalities: From charming to tender, from innocent to willful, to sexy and fiery or noble and cool, the game has designed a variety of female characters with different personalities. This setting not only enriches the storyline of the game, but also allows each player to find that special character that touches their heartstrings in this colorful world.
